def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = []
    for x,y,z,w in get4idxs(idxs):
        check_xyzw_clustered = all_close([x,y,z,w], ctx)
        check_xyzw_lshape = (
            (is_below(x, y, ctx) and is_left(x, y, ctx) and is_left(y, z, ctx))
            or (is_below(y, x, ctx) and is_right(y, x, ctx) and is_below(z, y, ctx))
            or (is_right(x, y, ctx) and is_below(y, z, ctx) and is_below(z, w, ctx))
            or (is_below(x, y, ctx) and is_below(y, z, ctx) and is_left(z, w, ctx))
        )
        if (
            check_xyzw_clustered
            and check_xyzw_lshape
        ):
            results.append([x,y,z,w])
    return results
state = turn(state)
